channel.title: TorBirdy has no update for a long time
channel.description:
Hi all,
Does anyone know why TorBirdy in Icedove has no updates for a very long time? It's last updated was on May 14th 2016.
Thanks.

item.title: TorBirdy has no update for a long time
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
TorBirdy does not support Thunderbird 68

Roger Dingledine wrote:

Alas, I think it might be a while until torbirdy gets an update – it involves somebody looking at Thunderbird 68 to see what new privacy invasive problems they put into it.

Read full topic
item.source: TorBirdy has no update for a long time

item.title: TorBirdy has no update for a long time
item.dc:creator: 0x88B44200
item.description:
ok, i got it. thanks!

Read full topic
item.source: TorBirdy has no update for a long time

item.title: TorBirdy has no update for a long time
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
It’s the Debian torbirdy package. Updates come from Debian stable. Not
mozilla add-ons.

Read full topic
item.source: TorBirdy has no update for a long time

item.title: TorBirdy has no update for a long time
item.dc:creator: 0x88B44200
item.description:
Thanks a lot @Ego

I’ll try it later. But I don’t understand why didn’t it be updated automatically from Addons managerment in Icedove? Even “checking update” shows no more updates since 14 May 2016. It’s version was still 0.1.3

Have a nice day.

Read full topic
item.source: TorBirdy has no update for a long time

item.title: TorBirdy has no update for a long time
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

First of all, moved this topic, as this question isn’t Whonix specific. Secondly, there has just been an update on the 30th of November: https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/torbirdy

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
